subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Period of the Long Change refers to the second period of hockey games, when teams defend the end of the ice farther from their benches. The N.H.L. is considering adopting that setup for overtime.
snippet: The Period of the Long Change refers to the second period of hockey games, when teams defend the end of the ice farther from their benches. The N.H.L. is considering adopting that setup for overtime.
